author: smorovic
body:
- fix for thread safety issue #18902
- remove deprecated file output modes that haven't been used in production for a while
- take care of #21645. As deprecated options are removed, some changes there don't apply
- fix for forever trying to acquire a file lock (timing out). In rare cases this was causing processes to get stuck on an old run, mostly in case of hardware problems
- FastMonitoringService was making assumptions about seeing only one lumisection at the time (#21141).  Processing of multiple lumi blocks is however still not possible with current DAQ output module implementation.
title: DAQ updates
